<<<<<<< HEAD
The description and the benefits of a regular education a sermon preach'd in the Cathedral Church of St. Paul, at the anniversary meeting of the gentlemen educated at St. Paul's School, January 25th 1699/1700 / by Samuel Bradford. Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.
[1], 20 p.
Printed by William Redmayne and to be sold by John Nutt, London : 1700.
"Published at the request of the stewards." Running title: A sermon preached to the gentlemen educated at St. Paul's School. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
